nodes.text: The Bogden sector was a sector located on the Inner Rim of the galaxy. It contained the world of Bogden. Jacen Solo traveled through the sector aboard the Anakin Solo in order to pick up Ben Skywalker aboard the Sith Meditation Sphere.

Bogden and the Bogden sector appeared in the preview for Legacy of the Force: Sacrifice (published in Legacy of the Force: Exile) but they were cut from the final version and respectively replaced by Contruum and the Contruum system.
